title: The top 10 audiobooks on Audible.com
text:
Audible.com best-sellers for week ending October 4th:

Fiction:

1. Carnival Row: Tangle in the Dark by Stephanie K. Smith, narrated by Karla Crome (Audible Original)

2. Carmilla by Joseph Sheridan Le Fanu, narrated by Phoebe Fox, Rose Leslie, David Tennant, David Horovitch, James Wilby, Susan Wooldridge, Hannah Genesius (Audible Studios)

3. Camp Red Moon by R. L. Stine, narrated by the author and a full cast (Audible Original)

4. The Sisters by Dervla McTiernan, narrated by Aoife McMahon (Audible Originals)

5. the way she spoke by Isaac Gomez, narrated by Kate del Castillo (Audible Original)

6. The Mystwick School of Musicraft by Jessica Khoury, narrated by Suzy Jackson (Audible Originals)

7. Bloody Genius: A Virgil Flowers Novel, Book 12 by John Sandford, narrated by Eric Conger (Penguin Audio)

8. The Water Dancer (Oprah’s Book Club): A Novel by Ta-Nehisi Coates, narrated by Joe Morton (Random House Audio)

9. The Institute: A Novel by Stephen King, narrated by Santino Fontana (Simon & Schuster Audio)

10. Where the Crawdads Sing by Delia Owens, narrated by Cassandra Campbell (Penguin Audio)

Nonfiction:

1. My Lost Family: An Audible Original by Danny Ben-Moshe and Dasha Lisitsina, narrated by Danny Ben-Moshe (Audible Original)

2. The Burnout Generation by Anne Helen Petersen, narrated by the author (Audible Original)

3. Blowout: Corrupted Democracy, Rogue State Russia, and the Richest, Most Destructive Industry on Earth by Rachel Maddow, narrated by the author (Random House Audio)

4. Body of Proof: An Audible Original by Darrell Brown, Sophie Ellis, narrated by Darrell Brown, Sophie Ellis (Audible Originals)

5. Talking to Strangers: What We Should Know About the People We Don’t Know by Malcolm Gladwell, narrated by Malcolm Gladwell (Hachette Audio)

6. The Home Front: Life in America During World War II by Audible Original, narrated by Martin Sheen (Audible Originals)

7. Press Pause: A Young Person’s Guide to Managing Life’s Challenges by Catherine Singer, narrated by Catherine Singer (Audible Originals)

8. Inside Out: A Memoir by Demi Moore, narrated by Demi Moore (HarperAudio)

9. Stillness Is the Key by Ryan Holiday, narrated by the author (Penguin Audio)

10. Girl, Stop Apologizing (Audible Exclusive Edition): A Shame-Free Plan for Embracing and Achieving Your Goals by Rachel Hollis, narrated by Rachel Hollis (HarperCollins Leadership)

–—
